allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: complete SDD design phase for reverse-spec v2.0

Full spec-driven development artifacts for the AST-enhanced reverse-spec
skill system:

- Constitution v1.0.0: 6 core principles \(AST accuracy, hybrid pipeline,
  uncertainty marking, read-only safety, Node.js ecosystem, bilingual docs\)
- Feature spec: 27 FRs, 9 SCs, 7 user stories with acceptance scenarios
- Research: ts-morph, dependency-cruiser, Handlebars, secret detection,
  token counting strategies
- Data model: 8 entities with Zod schemas, ER diagram, state transitions
- API contracts: 6 modules \(core-pipeline, graph, diff-engine, generator,
  batch, llm-client\) with full function signatures and guarantees
- Implementation plan: project structure, constitution checks \(pre/post\)
- Tasks: 55 tasks across 8 phases, dependency graph, parallel strategy
- Quickstart guide with verification steps

Includes analyze-phase fixes:
- C1: checkpoint path moved to specs/ \(Constitution IV compliance\)
- I1: US2.4 revised to autonomous progress \(aligns with SC-005\)
- U1: new llm-client contract \(default Opus, user-configurable model\)
- U2: orchestrator files added to plan + contracts
- U3: baseline skeleton serialization for lossless drift detection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(for f in specs/001-reverse-spec-v2/spec.md specs/001-reverse-spec-v2/plan.md specs/001-reverse-spec-v2/data-model.md specs/001-reverse-spec-v2/tasks.md specs/001-reverse-spec-v2/contracts skills/reverse-spec/SKILL.md skills/reverse-spec-batch/SKILL.md skills/reverse-spec-diff/SKILL.md)
